Package ro.tuiasi

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
ro.tuiasi.GUI
public class GUI extends Object
GUI class represents the graphical user interface for the application. It sets up the main frame, form fields, and handles validation and interactions.

    • validateFields

      private boolean validateFields(JTextField keyTextField, JTextField emailTextField, JPasswordField passwordField)
      Validates the input fields and updates the error label accordingly.
      Parameters:
      keyTextField - Key text field to be validated.
      emailTextField - Email text field to be validated.
      passwordField - Password field to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if all fields are valid, false otherwise.
